101.content: What alignment should Jacob be in?
101.title: Jacob

1011.content:
It was just as any other Saturday. You wake up and head towards the light switch to get dressed. There's nothing going on this week, so you figure you should go to your friend Ethan's house for the day.

Just as you were about to turn on the light, out of the corner of your eye you notice something shiny... no, glowing. Looking directly at it, you notice a ring with a note attached to it. It reads, "Put in on, and say, '6 feet'". You were confused, but you did as it were told. You almost drop the ring just as you put it on your finger. You whisper, "6 feet."

Your body freezes, then starts to expand. A pulse rushes through your body as you grow, along with your clothes, to exactly 6 feet tall. You were amazed at the change, and immediately rush downstairs to tell your mom. Unfortunately, you weren't used to your new body yet, and you fall 5 steps down.

"Jacob, how many times have I told you to be careful on the stairs?" yells your mother from the kitchen.

"Mom!" you yell back, in a voice slightly deeper than normal. "You've got to see what this new ring does!"

"You mean your glowing ring? You've had that for years," explains your mother.

"No Mom, I just got it, and look at me now!"

Your mom sighs as she walks towards the staircase where you lay. She examines you up and down with a confused look on her face. "Is there something wrong?" she asks.

"No Mom, that ring must have made me grow somehow. I'm huge!"

Your mother's eyebrows narrow. "You've always been 6 feet tall, Jake."

"No I haven't, I put the ring on and said, '6 feet', and then I grew to be this size. Watch." You look at the ring. "8 feet," you say.

The same feeling resumes, and your body stretches higher and higher, until you stand at exactly 8 feet tall.

"You should probably lie down. You don't sound very well," says your mother.

"I told Ethan I'll be over shortly," you object. "Just need to get dressed." You head back upstairs, being careful not to trip again. Maybe Ethan will be impressed at my new height, you think. Would you like to stay at 8 feet tall or grow taller?
1011.title: The Ring

choices: Chill with Ethan and play video games.
10111.content: After getting dressed you go back downstairs and have breakfast, the ring you have stays on your finger as you notice a chair and various things in the house have changed to accommodate you. As a quick test you look at the ring and say "six feet" upon shrinking down the formerly big things such as the chair have changed too. Therefore it's safe to say that no matter how big you grow the world adjusts for you, or at least your house. Also you reason that those who know you will think it was normal that you were as tall as you were. "Eight feet." you say again going back to your former height. Once again the house adjusts. You head outside, Ethan's house isn't too far but with your new size you make it with ease. You find Ethan outside waiting for ya. "Hey there Jake!" He calls out to you. This was a good time to test out your ring, or you could just go about your day with Ethan.
10111.title: Stay at 8 feet tall

1012.content:
You were sleeping one night when you heard a voice speak to you in your dream. "Hello, Jacob. I know that you want to be a giant, and that if you were a giant, you would want to destroy as much as possible. That is why I have decided to give you the ability of being able to change your own size. You just have to say that you wish you were a certain height, and you will grow to that height. Grow and wreak havoc."

You woke up from the dream and got dressed. You put on a shirt and shorts, along with your favorite pair of Seattle skyline socks. You've always imagined the buildings on your socks as big as the ones in real life, but now you won't have to imagine it anymore. You went downstairs, put your shoes on, then said, "I wish I was 10' tall."

Immediately after you said your wish, you started inching upward toward the ceiling. Everything around you started getting smaller. You stopped growing when your head hit the ceiling. You realize that the door is too small to fit through, and you don't want to shrink down, so you decide to grow out of the house. You say, "I wish I was 50' tall." You immediately start growing once again. Your head broke through the ceiling, then only moments later, the roof, as well. Once you stopped growing, the house collapsed on itself. Good thing your family was at your neighbor's house, otherwise, they would have been killed by the house falling on them. Since you hadn't had breakfast yet, you picked up the pile of rubble that was your house and ate it. You thought it tasted really good, and wanted to have some more. You couldn't decide if you should terrorize the neighborhood or grow more, so you decided to ask your older brother. You looked around and saw the neighbor's house that your family was at. You walked over to the house and ripped the roof off of the house. You picked your brother out of the house, then crushed it.

"Hey there, Kyle. How does it feel being the 'little' bro now? As you can probably tell, I now have the ability to grow at will. Should I grow some more or should I play with the neighborhood?"

"You shouldn't do either, Jacob . It's not-"

You tightened the grip you had on Kyle. "If you don't tell me to grow or play with the neighborhood right now, I will crush you."

"I'm not going to-," Kyle muttered before you crushed him to death with your fist.

"You should've told me to grow or play with the neighborhood," you said to your now dead brother.


You now decide to...

Bruce woke up lying in the countryside, 200 meters tall; he liked sleeping outdoors. The few children that had become all-powerful two months ago had something in common: they loved being giants. And no one liked it more than Bruce. With their omnipotence they fixed any harm they caused, and while most didn't like unstoppable giant children messing with their daily lives, they also had quite a number of fans, mostly among normal children, and The Mighty Bruce, as he liked being called, was a favorite.

Bruce stretched out, and then scratched his tummy under his pajamas. He then noticed something tiny holding to one of his fingers, so he sat up and lifted his hand. Of course, it was a normal child, looking in awe at his huge face.
"Hi, what's your name?" he asked with a smile.
"I'm Mike. I live in the closest village, and I totally had to meet you. You're so cool!"
"Yeah, I know" he smirked, blushing a bit. "Let's have some fun! Anything you want to do?"

1111.content:
Most children feel they are constantly looked down by others. They feel offended because they are smaller than grown-ups. They secretly desire to be much, much taller than them, whether it be for power, revenge, or plainly satisfaction. Few children keep this desire when it was granted, allowing them to enjoy themselves. The greatest example of this is Jacob Jones, a 10 year old from the suburbs of San Francisco.

No one could explain how it happened, they only know what happened. It was a normal summer morning, as Jacob walked to the kitchen for breakfast. As he walked, he noticed the ground seemed to go farther and farther away. The table next to him climbed lower next to his leg. Everything around him seemed to shrink. He paused in awe as he watched the world change, his clothes eventually ripped clean off his body, leaving him with only his extra-elastic underwear. He snapped out of his trance when his head hit the ceiling and had to bend down until he stopped growing.

So Jacob transformed from four foot six to twelve foot three. The rest is history.

We join the giant Jacob in the present as he is...
1111.title: Growth Spurt

choices: He gets in the back of a moving truck
11111.content:
Collecting fame as the mother of the tallest child in the world? Excellent. Taking care of him? Not so much.

Jacob ate nearly twenty times as much as he used to to support his prodigious bod, so his mother was constantly shopping with baskets full of cereal, bread, lunch meat, potato chips, etc. Jacob's clothes were handmade by a tailor in San Francisco, but due to her fees, Jacob was restricted to five sets of clothes, three sets of pajamas, a sweater, socks, size 48 shoes, and a pair of swim trunks. Jacob's mother always a thin wallet, so she hired a babysitter and got herself a job for support. She wasn't fond of her new life.

Jacob had hardships as well, always having to bend his knees while walking around his house, being taller than the ceiling. He had to walk on his hands and knees to squeeze through doors. He was constantly picked on, for some said that he didn't belong anywhere, an alien.

Jacob sat in his custom-made chair and poured an entire box of Cheerios in with a full gallon of milk. Using a cooking spoon made to contain a cup of food, he ate with his siblings, 14 year old Dalton and 8 year old Ruth. After he finishes breakfast his mother has his lunch ready for him, a collection of food that a normal adult would take days to eat. Jacob, while bending down, puts on his sweater and backpack and heads outside. How does he get to school?

Being famous for his extraordinary size is difficult to cope with these people to be ignored within a public eye. But now, Jacob has to face his difficult task and get used to this by getting educated at school. It was his first day back from the summer and nerves have started to kick in from a 10 year old. His parents are well comforted and hoping he'll get on fine once he'll get used to all of its surroundings.

Getting to school was a bit harsh from the start with in general. Because he was much nervous about it, he had to be taken to school by his father, via a moving truck which was used for moving houses, and it was a perfect size for Jacob to get in. There was some modifications to be made, the windows were placed at the sizes so Jacob can see when the truck is moving, seat-belts where placed and one seat for his 8 year old sister, Ruth so that she would take care of him when travelling along. His brother, Dalton, sat at the front with his father and once all on-board, the truck moves and heads to school for drop offs, and Jacob was the first of the three.

It only took the journey a couple of minutes before the truck was parked at the front of the school before saying goodbyes from all and Jacob got out and the truck drives away to drop the rest further. He was now on his own and feeling shaken, wondering how many students react to an over 12 feet boy like him. His friend's name is Liam, he's same age as Jacob and stands at 4'10 and 95lbs. He knew him for some years and was not afraid of him being taller than anything around the area, even the first time he met him when Liam admired the look of him and was not afraid to go up and say hello to a giant and both became friends since.

Right now, Liam was in his bedroom upstairs, when he just got dressed and ready to go. Then, a series of booms went out again and the ground keeps on shaking as every step it takes. That's when Liam already knew what made it was coming and looked at the window to see his giant friend, Jacob who spotted him through the window and kneeled down to give him a smile to his face and spoke out with his echoed high pitched voice.

"Hey Liam, you ready to have have a fun time with me?" Jacob asked with a smile as he looked close to Liam through the window as he replied, "Yeah, I'd just grab my things and I'll be down in the minute."

"Sure, no problem!" Jacob replied and soon, Liam disappeared and closed the window in front of him.

It took him just a couple of minutes to get himself ready, although he was watched by his friend in a kneel position outside. But he didn't panicked and takes his time, before he came out of the door with his things, including his red t-shirt, yellow multi coloured swim trunks, and black sandals as well and he was greeted by a giant hand he stepped over and lifted off the ground to see a huge face of his best friend and both smiled as a giant 10 year old, stands up to get himself ready to move off.

"Thanks for taking me somewhere to have fun with you." Liam acknowledged as he sat down to take a ride on his friend's hand, and Jacob replied, "Sure, no problem! That's why being big is much better than nothing."

"Yeah, it's true that you're the biggest kid around." Liam says while Jacob giggled from what he heard from him, and soon, he was off again and walked through the streets to have some leisure whatever fun they can spend time on. But where did they go exactly?

My name is Phil Jones. Welcome to my nightmare.

It all started back when I was in my lab, doing finishing touches on my science project. My plan was to revolutionize agriculture by providing a formula that is highly beneficial to the growth of plants. For the final test, I dropped a few drops of the formula on a healthy sword fern. It slowly expanded to about 120% of its size, and it was still healthy. It appeared as if I was ready to present it.

Then my brother, Jacob, came in. Telling him about the formula was the worst mistake of my life. Immediately after he snatched the formula and ran away. I tried to stop him, but I slipped on the slick floor. Outside the lab he began to drink it. I figured the formula would lethally poison him. For the sake of humanity, if I knew what would've happened, I would've hoped it too.

I watched in terror as his body began expanding, along with his clothes. The ceiling immediately gave way. I ran out the back door of the lab and out of our house. Looking back at the behemoth that once was my shorter, younger brother, I watched as his growth came to a stop. He towered over the neighborhood. Then the worst came. His massive hand came and grabbed me by the head, causing excruciating pain. He dropped me on his other hand, looked at me in the eye, and said,

1131.content:
Jacob is a nice kid. He always does what his parents ask him to do. His life was normal until he was 4 years old. At that time, it began to grow rapidly. No one knew the cause and no one could stop it. The boy grew almost day by day.
Now Jacob is 10 years old and 2,000 feet tall and his life is quite complicated. He only has one shorts and it's a bit tight. But he rarely gets a new one. True, his super-growth is over, but his body is growing proportionately than other children. His parents are already afraid of his puberty. He spends all his time outdoors. He can only lie in the tent set up for him. That's why they had to move much more south, don't let Jacob get cold in the winter. They own a huge area. Fields, forests and a lake the boy can bathe in. The big place is important because Jacob is hyperactive and loves to run. This is a bit dangerous to others because a person has no chance against a foot that is over 350 feet long. But at least the rhythmic earthquakes warn the man when the boy is approaching. But that doesn't mean Jacob won't leave the house. He often helps on construction sites, in difficult terrain cargo handling and all he can do. He even helped with film-making a couple of times. (Camera from high, cars flying in real life, earthquakes on command.) He loved to help.
Although he regretted not being in a vehicle. And if he was running at full strength, only very few things could miss him. For him, the strangest things were average than when dentists and construction workers were working in his mouth. He is very careful in this case, and if he knows there are people around him.
This morning departs on average. Jacob wakes up early and just lies in the tent. He knows that if he woke up he would wake up his family. 20 minutes later, he slowly climbs out of the tent and slowly climbs out of the house. He gets up and starts walking towards the lake. He drinks a few sips from the river and wash (oneself) with the lake water. He very excited because ...
1131.title: Gentle

1132.content: Walking into his fourth grade classroom, ten-year-old Jacob Jones slung his backpack off of his shoulder and sat down at his desk. Sliding his backpack between his legs, the child dug around inside until he found his blue notebook. His mother had bought it for him in hopes of encouraging his writing and drawing skills, and she had done just that. Opening it up, the first few pages were littered with sketches of giants stomping, eating, and forcing tiny people to succumb to his dominance. Smiling at his work, the boy began doodling another giant on a blank page, when suddenly he began to feel strange...
1132.title: Evil.

121.content: What alignment should Jasmine be in?
121.title: Jasmine, Class A

choices: Have another pill and grow bigger!
1211.content:
"Daddy! I want my pills!" said Jasmine behind the curtain.

"Be patient, sweetie, we're just about ready," replied her father.

The two of them were about to conduct a great experiment. Dr. Parker, currently one of the richest and best scientists, is on a mission to fulfill her the wishes of Jasmine, her daughter. Jasmine stood behind the large, wooden door, with a large pile of clothes next to her. She paced back and forth impatiently.

At last Dr. Parker opened the door with two pills in a napkin with a glass of water, and quickly closed it to ensure his daughter's privacy. After a few seconds, series of indescribable noises came from behind the wooden door. The noises died down, and Dr. Parker called, "How are you feeling, honey?"

"Great! Awesome!" came the reply.

"Put on your clothes, honey. I can't do them for you," said Dr. Parker.

"Fineeeeee," Jasmine whined.

After about 10 minutes, the door opened, revealing a 12 foot tall little girl. She wore overalls and a T-shirt, stuff that a normal 7 year old kid can wear. Sure, she was huge, but still young.

"Daddy," said Jasmine, "I want to..."

122.content: What alignment should Jasmine be in?
122.title: Jasmine, Class B

123.content: What alignment should Jasmine be in?
123.title: Jasmine, Class C

choices: Full Thorough Medical Exam! Concerned mother!
Jasmine is hungry! Good thing the Orange grew too!
1231.content:
Dr.Parker was 1 of the richest and best scientists in the world. She was also arguably 1 of the craziest!

For nearly 3 years straight she had been experimenting with manipulating the size of things. Working herself to the brink of exhaustion many times. Finally her best project had come to fruition.

A functioning Growth Ray. She had been testing it a few months now on various things and on some small living animals and insects in varied small doses on varied settings.

Finally she was ready for human trials but who?
She had no desires to be bigger plus if she got too big or suffered adverse effects she might not be able to continue her work.


Dr.Parker did have a 7 year old daughter named Jasmine who was snobbish and demanding at times but otherwise gentle and harmless.


The women shook her head. No she couldn't possibly use her own daughter it would be immoral. Plus who knows what a giant child even a gentle one would be like. There was also the what if factor when it came to adverse effects! No using Jasmine was an absolute no no!


Dr.Parker and her part time assistant left the lab to mull over their options. Meanwhile Jasmine snuck into the lab it was after all part of their mansion. Jasmine had just woken up a short time ago.


She had forgotten that it was the maids day off when she went to look for her clothes. Failing to find them since she was a bit odd when it came to modesty she decided this morning would be one of her Panty mornings.


So there was Jasmine in nothing but her silk pink panties with tiny pink bows along the waistline. Jasmine snuck her way over to the computer this time the computer for the Growth Ray and played around with various buttons. Little did Jasmine realize she altered the settings to Max Power output, max exposure , set the interval functions quite high ( controls number of growth spurts ) and even locked the system to be permenent and irreversible.


Soon Jasmine heard footsteps and voices. Panicking she rushed to hide inadvertently going into the testing room the door locking behind her. Little did Jasmine account for no place to hide so she sat on the table grabbing the Orange that was on it and hoping somehow she wouldn't get spotted.


"Let's just at least run this test this morning" said the assistant.

Dr.Parker agreed and the 2 so busily set to work so used to the task by now they didn't even look at the caked monitor to notice Jasmine.


It was then that Jasmine noticed a big gun looking device pointed at her the table and the Orange. There was no reaction time or warning for anyone though when Dr.Parker assuming everything to be good to go pressed the firing button.


The powerful laser fired and hit Jasmine enveloping her and the piece of fruit. Oddly the laser didn't hurt a bit but Jasmine could feel an odd feeling. Energy was building within her. She somehow felt stronger, more energized, more full of life.

It was 60 seconds into firing that the scientists finally noticed their error.

"Oh my god doctor quick stop the laser" panicked the assistant.

Dr.Parker was about to question why when perhaps 1 of worst fears were realized. There on the table holding the Orange and in her panties only no less was Jasmine her likely soon to be not so "little" girl in front of the laser of the Growth Ray for 75 seconds and counting now!


Panicking it took another 12 ish seconds to deactivate the device.


In the test room Jasmine was yet unaware she was noticed as she watched the lasers intensity start to decrease then suddenly it stopped completely. The feelings the laser brought faded.


She was greatful at least that the laser didn't hurt and she didn't really feel any different than she had 5 minutes ago except feeling as tho she had gotten a lifetime of beauty sleep or at least as though she had awaken from the best sleep of her young life.


Jasmine did notice however her creamy white skin felt smoother, her brown hair had more of a sheen to it.

What happened next Jasmine dreaded!


Over a speaker system the lab had came her moms voice.

"Jasmine don't you dare move young lady" said her mom in a tone that even a child like her could understand as not good. She didn't dare move from the table. However a change happened that was small enough to go unnoticed for now. Jamsmine went from 3"10 in height to 4 foot even.

Her mom spoke again in a different tone. A mix of concern and professionalism like a doctor to her patient.

"Listen honey I know you're worried about being in trouble but right now there are more important concerns. I need to ask you some things and you need to answer as clear and honest as you can ok"


She wasn't sure her mom could hear but in fear she replied meekly "Y-yes mom"


"Ok good. Now I don't want to scare you but that thing that just shot at you was something mommy has been expriementing with. We don't know yet how it will affect people but your body will probably go through some changes. 1st question do you feel any different?"


"Umm. No not really I mean my skin feels smoother, my hair feels like it has been cared for better and I feel like I just had the bestest night of sleep ever"

"Hmm interesting. Ok next question can you describe how the laser felt?"


"Huh well it uhh kinda felt tingly at 1st then the entire time I felt weird, like I had tons of energy and like I was somehow stronger than usual. I can't really splain it"


Dr.Parker was about to explain things to Jasmine when she noticed her acting strange.


Jasmine began to feel a different weird feeling. Her body tingled and vibrated and pulsated. She looked at herself in curiousity as she felt something building within her.

Suddenly she began to grow the Orange and oddly yet thankfully her pink panties growing with her. Her green eyes full of mixed emotions as her body swelled in size.

4"6 .. 5" ... 5"6 ... 6".. 7"

Bigger and taller she grew her body maintaining perfect proportionate growth all over.

10" ... 12"

At 15 foot tall her head bumped the ceiling.

"M-mom what's happening to me" asked the still growin 7 year old.


Her butt crushed the wooden table as she was forced to grow ever larger. Her mom and her mothers assistant decided it best to retreat to safety.

The now 20 foot child was filing the room her feet brushed up against the laser activating it manually. The growing child got another dose of the Growth Ray much to her retreating mothers dismay.

Her legs then snaked around the laser that was now firing at her panties right between the legs. She was forced into a crouched sitting position holding the Orange to her chest.


Her legs burst thru the wall into the lab meanwhile Jasmine could crouch no further and the ceiling gave into the 30 foot growing girl.

Her head and soon after her shoulders busted thru to the 2nd then 3rd floor of their estate while her legs punched thru serveral walls and rooms.

Finally she felt something press again her girl parts thru her panties. It was none other than the tip of the laser still firing on her. She inched back a tiny bit but with her growing form it was short lived as she found it pressing again "that spot" again.

More and more it pressed as she grew still firing full blast on its target. Soon her growing body dislodged the Growth Ray from the ceiling. The Ray was still firing and pressing up against the spot until her growing body pressed it against the wall and started to crush it like a tin can. 5 seconds of vice like pressure and the laser stopped as parts were either flattened or scattered off in busted pieces.


Finally Jasmine's legs busted thru the front of their mansion while her head busted thru the roof. Her left arm punched thru a wall to outside while her right was occupying the 4th floor corridor.


Finally Jasmine stopped growing for now at a height of 60 Feet tall.
Dr.Parker was in awe among other mixed feelings.

Worse still she knew this wasn't over. She was certain her daughter would grow bigger eventually though how big was anyone's guess at this point.

1st things 1st however
1231.title: Gentle

1233.content: Jasmine had been abandoned in an orphanage when she was a newborn. Seven years later, she felt bored. She had never been outside and she found all the teachers and employees there really dull. She didn't look forward to be adopted though: the adults that went there seemed just as dull. She deserved better, she thought. If she was going to be bossed around anyway she'd rather stay there with her few friends. But she would love to roam freely outside and just have fun all day.
1233.title: Neutral

choices: She turns him into a dog
12332.content:
It was June already and it was rather hot, and Jasmine wished she could have an ice-cream, which they were rarely fed in the orphanage. And right then she felt something in her grip. She looked at her hand and was delighted to realize that she was holding an ice-cream. Exactly the chocolate ice-cream she last had, which she had pictured in her mind.

A wide smile appeared in her face. She was surprised, but not really shocked. At her young age magic stuff didn't feel implausible to her. She looked at the room's boring white walls, and wished to make them light blue, which was her favorite color because that's how the sky was outside. It immediately happened, and then she had the sun, a rainbow and several clouds appear, way better drawn than she could possibly do by hand.

She was pretty excited, but before trying more things she wanted to enjoy her ice-cream, so after admiring her work she walked to the corridor, where she tore the packaging, pulled it into her short trousers' pocket and started munching it. There she was noticed by Mr. Hogdson, the grumpiest employee in the whole orphanage, who frowned even more than usual.

"Where did you get that ice-cream?" he said sternly, getting there in a few strides.

Normally Jasmine would have been frightened, but right now she was pretty confident about her newfound magic, so she sticked out her tongue. Mr. Hodgson wasn't amused.

"How do you dare?" he said.
12332.title: She gains omnipotence

123322.content:
"Become a doggy!" Jasmine grinned, and as he was about to grab her arm Mr. Hodgson suddenly found himself turned into a Yorkshire terrier. He still retained his human mind, and looked around in confusion at the floor just below him, then up at the little girl. He tried to talk, but he could only yip

"You're so cute now!" Jasmine exclaimed, throwing herself on him. She started petting him, scrubbing his fur and rubbing him against the floor. Mr. Hodgson struggled desperately until he managed to free himself and ran through the corridor panicked. Then Jasmine turned him back into a human, and finding himself running on all fours he instantly lost balance and fell down spectacularly, bruising his shoulder.

He heard Jasmine laugh, and looking back he saw her floating in the air, near the ceiling. Terrified, he jumped on his feet and ran away from her, which Jasmine found even more hilarious. It was the first time she had been able to tease one of those severe, grumbling grown-ups around her, and it felt great. Would they punish her for it? Not if she didn't allow it.

"H- How can you-" muttered one of the astonished kids in the hallway, a couple years older than Jasmine.

"Cool, huh? Wanna try?" she smiled at him from above.

Before he could answer the child was floating up at a height of over two meters. Unlike Jasmine he wasn't in charge, so he flapped his arms and legs trying to get in a vertical position, without attaining much.

"Charge!", Jasmine suddenly shouted as she launched herself against him and pushed him away as if they were in a space rocket with the gravity turned off. As the classmate that was with him tried in vain to lower him to the ground, she lied back in the air with her hands crossed behind her head and an ankle on her other knee, smiling happily.

She realized that one of the things she had enjoyed the most about Mr. Hodgson's predicament was looking at him from above, and that he probably felt as she had been feeling all this time. That's when she tought that actually being that taller than them would be a lot of fun. Or maybe becoming outright gigantic!
123322.title: She turns him into a dog

125.title: Jasmine, Class E

choices: Visit some of the largest cities in the world
Bask in the sun and take a nap
Actually, she should go on patrol again
1251.content:
"Wake up, everyone!" yelled Jasmine as the sun beat down on her.

The whole world obliged. They knew they would face no mercy if they did not do what Jasmine said. After all, she is an invincible, 7 year old girl in a swimsuit that's 200 miles tall. She could do anything she wanted.

After the "incident" which dare not be spoken, Jasmine named herself queen of the world. She also has unofficial nicknames from her subjects such as "Snob Queen" or "Immature Conqueror" due to her age and personality. Jasmine did not hear such rumors, for she can't hear individuals. Besides, she was beneficial to Earth, as long as there was no rebellion against her. Everyone had to accept her as their queen and peace would follow.

"Is everyone awake?" she called. And billions of megaphones responded with, "YES!" These megaphones were special; through wireless technology only Jasmine can hear the words spoken through it. As usual, everyone is awake.

Jasmine proceeds to step off her island and into the Atlantic Ocean. The Ocean has become her favorite traveling spot. She could see most of the world as she walked, making sure no ill was known. However, she dared not come near to the coast unless someone was in trouble. War and crime were internationally banned and were punishable by death. All thanks to Jasmine.

Today, Jasmine decided to take the day off. What shall she do first?

choices: Jasmine Frees herself from the mansion
Full Thorough medical exam! Concerned mother!

More and more it pressed as she grew still firing full blast on its target. Soon her growing body dislodged the Growth Ray from the ceiling. The Ray was still firing and pressing up against the spot until her growing body pressed it against the wall and started to crush it like a tin can. 5 seconds of vice like pressure and the laser stopped as parts were either flattened or scattered off in busted pieces.


Finally Jasmine's legs busted thru the front of their mansion while her head busted thru the roof. Her left arm punched thru a wall to outside while her right was occupying the 4th floor corridor.


Finally Jasmine stopped growing for now at a height of 60 Feet tall.
Dr.Parker was in awe among other mixed feelings.

Worse still she knew this wasn't over. She was certain her daughter would grow bigger eventually though how big was anyone's guess at this point.

1st things 1st however

1313.content:
BEEP! BEEP! BEEP!

As Michael woke up to the sound of his 7am alarm, a wave of excitement fell upon him. It was the first day of second grade.

"Mike! Come downstairs for breakfast!" yelled his mother. Michael hurriedly ran down the stairs to see that his mother was making blueberry pancakes, a tradition on the first day of school. Unfortunately, his two older brothers, Tony and Percy, were still finishing theirs. Upon seeing Michael, Tony, the oldest brother at age 17, walked up to Michael, put him in a headlock, and gave him a noogie.

"Good morning, Shorts," he taunted.

Shorts was the nickname he was given by his brothers. Michael was only 6 years old, standing at a measly three foot seven, more than two feet behind his older brothers. He hated being reminded of his stature and wished his brothers were the ones he could call "Shorts", not him.

The rest of breakfast went by smoothly. While Tony and Percy investigated any classes they shared, Michael discussed with his mother his nervousness about entering second grade. She told him it will be fun and Michael would rarely be bullied.

Soon, it was 7:40, and it was time for Michael to go to school. How does he travel there?
1313.title: First Day of School

13133.content:
"Michael, you should probably start walking," said Michael's mother. "Remember, no TV before dinner, do homework first. Oh, you don't need your backpack today. I'll see you after school! Bye, honey!"

And so Michael began his half-mile walk. He has walked this route many times last year, so he has no problem walking it again. This trip, however, seemed different. With every step, a small vibration traveled up his leg and across his body. He froze, and the vibrations stopped. Figuring it was nothing, the vibrations started again as Michael continued walking.

At last he arrived at school. It was 7:54 when he arrived, and school starts at 8:00, so he hurriedly went to his new classroom and sat down. The teacher, Mrs. Putz, introduced herself in front of the class and began to take roll. Naturally, Michael came last, with his last name beginning with Y.

As Mrs. Putz called out Michael's name, she looked at him and said in a confused tone, "What have your parents been feeding you?" Then she started giving instructions.

Soon, recess came, and Michael went and hid himself. He was nervous despite his mother's solace, especially since the weird vibrations came every step he took. He doesn't know this, but the vibrations he feels makes him taller. He is now four foot one, a full six inches from this morning.

The rest of the day came by quickly, and Michael, who is expecting his friend over at his house when he comes home, breaks into a run. As his speed increases, the vibrations increase more. At this point Michael tried his best to ignore them.

Michael opened the unlocked door, only to see his brother Percy waiting for him. "What's up, Shorts?" he taunts.

Suddenly Percy freezes, then turns around. "Dude!" he yells. "Looks like Shorts isn't that short anymore."

Michael became confused, as Tony yells, "Whoa! Tell him to measure up."

"Measure up," Percy commands, as he grabs Michael and pushes him to the measuring ruler. Michael finally understood the vibrations. How tall is he now?
13133.title: Vibrations

choices: Stomp repeatedly to make himself grow taller
131332.content:
"Whoa," Percy says as he marks the ruler. "Bro! He's almost as tall as Mom now."

"Get away from him; he's probably sick," Tony yells back at Percy. The two brothers head downstairs to their mancave.

Michael heads to the kitchen to make himself a snack, the vibrations still pulsing through his legs. Suddenly, he puts a mischievous grin on his face. What does he do?
131332.title: Contagious?

1321.content:
The planes circled above the city, dropping bombs as they pass by. It was extraordinary to see such a calamity this unexpected. What was even more unexpected was how it ended. Witnesses say a humongous being with the body of a grade-schooler walked into the city, crushed all of the planes before they could drop any more bombs, and threw them as far as he could out of the city. A rumor like this has never been told.

The weirdest part was that the rumor was true. After the crisis was finished, Michael left the city, being careful not to step on any buildings. Ever since the genie granted his wish of him becoming "huge" he enjoyed being dominant over nearly everything. However, he knew that even at his size, more than 200 feet tall, he was still vulnerable, hence he cannot destroy everything.

Michael walked back to the mountains, where no one but him visits, and waited. He was exiled by a secret government organization in an effort to "keep the peace". But that doesn't stop him from escaping. Michael felt the need to help the city as soon as he saw the planes drop bombs, and felt the government would be fine if he saved the people.

Suddenly, Michael felt a tapping on his shoe. He turned around, and saw a boy so small Michael could crush him if he wanted to. The boy had dirty black hair, wore a plaid jacket, and carried a backpack. "Hello," he said to the boy. "Who are you?"

"Who are YOU?" the boy responded in an excited tone. "I mean, you're tall and strong and awesome! I've never seen anyone like you before."

"Thanks, I'm Michael." The giant turned back around and sighed. He spoke to the boy, "You should probably leave. It's not safe here--"

"It's not safe anywhere for me," the boy interrupted.

"Why not?" asked Michael.

"Because...
1321.title: Disaster Averted!

choices: Something else happens along the way.
13212.content:
"Because a couple of guys in masks are chasing me," the boy said, looking around.

"Why are they chasing you?" Michael asked.

"I don't know! I had gone out to buy some ice cream, and then these two guys tried to grab me and put me in the back of a truck!"

"That's awful," Michael sympathized. "Well, no one is gonna hurt you now. You're safe with me."

"Thank you, Michael!" the boy exclaimed, smiling.

"What's your name?"

"I'm Danny," he said.

"Well, it's nice to meet ya, Danny," Michael said, extending a giant hand out to his small friend. The giant boy could barely feel the handshake that Danny returned.

Picking up Danny and bringing him to his face, he asked, "So, where are these two masked men you are talking about?"

"Last time I saw them, they were down at the creek. I had run across it with them chasing me, but they slipped and fell in."

Michael couldn't help but snicker.

"Well, lets go get 'em," the giant boy said.

"Who is coming?"

"Giants like you, and they are after all the ones they can find as they are amassing an army to take over the entire planet and enslave mankind... they are have powers beyond belief. Any kid that was turned into a giant, also gained superpowers as well..." the boy also said before he started to collasped right on the ground and started to go into a seizure.

Michael then picked up the little boy and brought him to his face. "Are you okay?"

"I am starting to change..... I am about to become a giant like you... but.... AAAHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!" He screamed before suddenly his body begins to expand and Michael was forced to drop him back on the ground softly has he begun to expand to almost the same height as Michael. After he was done growing, the boy got right back up and said. "I know, big surprise..."

"I can understand... btw the way... who are you?"

"I am Danny, and as I said, they are coming, we need to get a move on. They are going to head towards your city next to draw them out, so we need to warn them."

What happens now?

Michael Young stood originally at 3'7", but now, he was standing at 250 feet tall! How his current giant status came about remains unknown to him, his brothers, and everyone that is watching his first move as a giant. He wants to punish his brothers for being so mean to him. He had always been the baby of the family, and so you would have thought that his parents would have been much more protective of their youngest.

They weren't.

He stands now, staring down at his two older brothers, James and Oscar, and an evil grin slithers its way across his adolescent face. James and Oscar were twins who were the same age, 15, but they looked nothing alike.

"You two are gonna pay!" He exclaims.

They attempt to run, but Michael quickly snatches them up, one in each hand.

"Lets see, who is gonna die first?" He snickers. "Enie, meenie, miney, moe..."

Michael grins; he's holding up Oscar, who screams at the giant eye sizing him up. The screams turn to pleadings as he sees Michael's tongue run over his lips.

Once Michael puts Oscar in his mouth, he has a decision to make; whether to end his older brother's suffering quickly by chomping down, or to drag it out by swallowing him whole. Michael chooses...
13222.title: Oscar

132222.content:
"You never did like me very much," Michael said, grinning. "But that doesn't really matter anymore."

"No wait!" Oscar pleaded, terrified of his fate. It had only been a few years ago that he was changing this same boy's diapers and babysitting him. Oh how the tables have turned.

He continued his pleas as his giant little brother quickly brought him up to his mouth and tossed him inside. Michael swished him from side to side for a moment, tasting him.

"Mm, you taste pretty good little bro," he said with a mouthful.

Growing bored after Oscar's struggles were dying down, he moved him on top of his molars with his tongue. The thought of what his brother may be seeing made him giggle. Finally, without hesitation, he brought his teeth together. Oscar's struggles died immediately as he was mushed up between the bigger brother's molars. After chewing for a moment, Michael swallowed with an overly-audible gulp.

Turning his eyes back to his only remaining (and shocked) brother, Michael...

Michael sat at home one day, watching the Cartoon Network. His family was out of town for the weekend, and he was entrusted with keeping the house safe. Everything was fine until the program changed to a floating, orange head with 3 eyeballs. He spoke with a voice louder than the TV would allow it to be, "Michael, you have been chosen."

Michael jumped, and listened. "The human race has been deemed by the gods as inferior, and you, among many, are the only one to be saved. I give you a mission to destroy all human life and nature. I also give to you special power that you may complete this mission. Failure to satisfy me will bring doom to you. Begin now."

The TV exploded with a flash of light, and everything around Michael seemed to shrink. After a few seconds Michael, much taller than the 6 year old kid he used to be, destroyed the ceiling of the room he was in, then the whole house. Neighbors saw the incident and screamed. And Michael's growth was only getting started.

He was given a mission to destroy everything on Earth. Where should he start first?

1422.content:
Today was a normal day, the city was wide awake by eight, people rushing around the streets, getting where they needed to be, as quickly as possible. Ashley was one such person, on her way to school. She sat at the back of the bus, her bag occupying the seat next to her so nobody could sit there. She pulled her hat down, the rim covering her eyes. She gazed out of the window, longing to see the sprawling countryside, to go to a place where she'd be able to relax, alone.

Her blue eyes would be drawn to the large buildings whenever she passed them by, architecture could be considered her passion, the thing she wished to work in when she was older. The way such enormous buildings were made fascinated her. Zoning out now, the girl's foot began to absently tap against the floor of the bus. Her imagination filled with arches and her own design for buildings as she remained distracted.

If she were paying attention, Ashley would've noticed the brief green flash in her eyes, the result of an experimental 'growth ray' misfiring. She remained distracted as her body began to grow, the only thing that got her attention being the creaking of the bus as her body quickly became too big to fit in it. Her blue eyes went wide as she observed the rapidly shrinking world, a rather large crashing noise being audible as she burst out of the back of the bus.

Ashley landed on her butt, which began to take up the entire road as she grew and grew. Her increasing mass sent cracks cascading through the tarmac, a large crater being left in her rear's wake. Quickly standing, the girl was amazed to see the surrounding buildings also shrinking. She payed no attention to the ground anymore as one of the tall buildings she was marveling at only a minute ago caught her vision. She walked over to it, her steps leaving large footprints, the holes getting slightly larger with each one.

Eventually, the girl stopped growing, her new eye level being near the top of the previously towering buildings. She stood at 400 feet in height, rivaling even the taller buildings in the city. Ashley tried to contain her shock, a hand covering her mouth as she peered around at her surroundings. Her cheeks went red as she looked to the floor, noticing an enormous presence of small things grouped around her shoes. She didn't need to guess what they were, she knew.

They were humans, people just like her. Just like she used to be. No doubt staring up at her, the amount of attention they gave made her nervous. This was an entirely new situation to the now gigantic girl, and she didn't know if she could take it. Her knees began to shake a little as she placed a 'dainty' hand upon a skyscraper for balance. As her fingers tightened around it, just a little, she could feel the material buckling under her strength.

As her eyes darted around the city streets beneath her, she acted, the girl.....
1422.title: Evil

choices: She ignored them, continuing to test her strength in the city.
She briskly left the city, hoping they wouldn't follow.
14221.content:
As if on impulse, her foot moved, landing in the mass of specks. It had happened before she'd even realized it, cracks ran out from the spot of impact, and the mass began to retreat, moving like a swarm of bugs.

What she'd done hit her at this, she'd killed people, lots of people. Her eyes widened further, it was quite a shock to take in. Ashley was about to try and apologize, before another realization hit, just how easy it was. It wasn't like they could do much to her, or that she needed to really apologize. They'd still be running.

Her eyes followed one crowd as they slowly surged down the thin road, moving around cars that lay abandoned on the road. She seemed to have caused quite a panic. A smile subconsciously spread across her face as she slowly removed her hand from the building she'd held, she wasn't exactly nervous anymore.

Thinking of the building, the twelve year-old turned her attention towards it, squinting in order to try and see through the windows. Lo and behold, she could see tiny people inside. Her smile widened into a semi-guilty smirk as she pushed her hand into the building once more, applying more force. The building fell rather easily, clouds of dust swirling around her feet as the rubble spread out. She could hear faint screams, which only further made her feel powerful.

With a shrug, she decided to stomp on the rubble, her foot sinking through it and onto the ground. The sinking felt rather nice, though as she turned her attention to the skies once more, she saw things, helicopters, planes. They were still tiny, but thoughts of the military crept into her mind. Could they hurt her? Did she want to find out?
14221.title: Smashed her foot into the main body of the crowd.

142211.content:
Ashley watched as a few jets seemed to be coming closer, the titanic twelve year-old cocking her head to the side. With another shrug of her shoulders, she crouched down, grabbing up a lump of the building like it was a chunk of a destroyed sand castle. With no more hesitation, she turned and threw it through another building, a large hole being formed in the skyscraper.

She gazed on at the destruction caused to the building. The twinge of guilt she'd felt for destroying what was such an expensive building faded within seconds, it just looked like a model to her now. Seeing that it hadn't been knocked over, Ashley shook her head, tutting a little. Deciding that the job was unfinished, she casually kicked the building, her shoe effortlessly cutting through the lower levels of the building. It collapsed onto the roof of her foot, more dust being released.

Unbeknownst to the girl, a news helicopter was circling just above her head, feeding live footage to the broadcasters. By now, everyone in the city knew of her growth, and most were beyond themselves with panic. All but one person, another kid who was actually one of Ashley's most close friends. She didn't have many, but the one or two she did have were very close to her. He'd immediately recognized her as the colossal girl on the news.

Taking his phone out, he called her, seeing if she'd respond.

Back where Ashley was, she'd just finished grinding the rubble of the latest building to dust, when she felt her phone vibrating in her pocket. It too had grown, along with everything that was on her at the time. Taking her phone out, she saw that it was Ben calling her.

She began to think: Did she bother answering, or was he just another one of these weak, defenseless people now, did he matter to her still?
142211.title: Ashley the Colossus

choices: "Please can you come and get me?"
1422111.content:
Ashley stuck her tongue out in thought as she wondered what to do. The ringing of the up-scaled phone boomed out, loud enough for Ben to hear it from across the city. She finally came to the decision to answer, tapping her giant finger against the green button.

"Ben?" She asked, cocking her head to the side as she waited to hear his voice in response. The girl began to pace the 'floor' as she usually did when having a phone call. Sadly, her increased size made it so she was causing even more panic as she spoke to her friend.

"Ash? How'd you get so big, you're a giant!" He spoke back, cringing as he heard the booming footsteps through the phone.

"I'm not sure, I was on the way to school, and the next thing I knew, I was like this," She explained, taking a seat on one of the shorter buildings she'd reached by now.

"Hmm, can you do one thing for me Ash?" Ben asked, running out of his home now. He peered around, not being able to see Ashley yet, since she was still around the taller stuff.

"What would that be?" She responded, watching as cracks cascaded along the roof of the building, her rear putting the roof under stress. The girl waited patiently for a response, her eyes now beginning to follow the crowds of people instead of the crumbling building beneath her.

What does Ben ask?
1422111.title: She answers the call.

choices: I'll show them my feet are great and squish them under them!
Maybe I can drown them in my sweat!

14221112.content:
"P-Please can you come get me?" Ben asked hopefully. "I'm outside looking for you!"

Ashley thinks about it for a second, watching the panicked crowds of tiny people by her shoes and nods. "Yeah, I think I can do that." She looks in the direction of her now tiny friend's house and then gets up. The streets get crushed under her massive weight and she smiles at the damage she's done with such little effort. "Be there in a few, try not to get stepped on." She says casually.

Before she can hangup though Ben tries to speak again. "W-W-Wait! Can you... Er well... maybe... do one more thing?" He asks nervously.

Ashley stops and waits. "What?"

Ashley couldn't see it, but Ben's face was lighting up red, he was so embarassed just thinking about what he was going to ask that he could barely make out the words. "Well... I um...." He started slowly. "Could you take off your shoes and socks?" He quietly finishes expecting her to just hangup and threaten to squish him.

Ashley heard the request and just shrugged. "Ummm alright, I guess it'd be easier on the tiny people that I'm stepping on if they get squished by my feet instead of my shoe." Ashley says as she pulls off her sneakers and finds a bit of a surprise. Her socks were drenched in sweat. "Oh wow, my feet are sooooo sweaty!" She says with a half smile. She throws her shoes aside without really thinking about the impact they would have on the tiny folk, they crushed cars and people alike and from the openings came a powerful sweaty preteen aroma.

When Ben heard what his giantess of a friend was saying he couldn't be happier. He didn't really understand why, being so young, but he loved the idea of his friend Ashley being so big and sweaty. "W-Well just make sure to find me!" He said trying to remain calm.

"Mhm yeah yeah" Ashley said as she held her phone to her ear with her shoulder. She bent down to peel off her socks. There was something enjoyable about her feet being so covered in sweat, she didn't understand it much, usually this would be gross. Maybe it was because she knew that the scent would be so much worse for the tiny people on the ground than for her? She set her foot down and removed the other sock. Wigging her toes she tosses the sweat drenched socks away.

Proving that fate hated the smaller folk around Ashley, the socks landed on a group of people trying to run from her. The wet cotton weighed the group down and it became clear to them as the miasma of preteen sweat filled their lungs that this would be their world now. They quickly found that they couldn't move, they were stuck to Ashley's socks because of the adhesion of her sweat. They cried out but their pleas only managed to get sweat in their mouths.

Ashley was completely oblivious to this as she proceeded to go find her friend. She was enjoying being a giantess so much more than she could ever have imagined! What could make this better? Maybe if she was bigger, but she was satisfied with this... for now. She began walking towards her friend's house leaving the dense city when she saw another group of children a few years older than her. This is the type of group that would've made fun of her for having sweaty feet, well... they would have if she was still small! She walked by them and thought about what she should do...
14221112.title: A friend's request

She then has come to her decision that would ultimately shake the world forever. During that whole process, when the phone ranged, the noise was so strong that it ended up shattering nearby windows extremely loud, and also causing many bursts of winds to be emitted from the noise. She then proceeded to then respond the words. “Sorry Ben, I got bigger plans now.” She smirked with an evil smile just as she pressed on the screen to decline the phone call from him, and then she proceeded to throw her phone onto the ground, crushing anyone unluckily enough to be in the debris of the huge falling phone. 1423.content:
They thought she was dead.

Her parents checked all over the house, her bedroom, the kitchen, even in the tightest cupboards, but they never found her. The police searched for weeks, but had no success either. The parents had nothing to do by weep over the loss of their daughter.

Miles away, in the middle of nowhere, a 12-year old girl lay in the sun. The rays of the sun woke her up. There was nothing to do out here. She could only think.

Amazingly, she didn't even need to eat or drink, nor was she ever noticed for the past few weeks after she ran away from her parents. From what she remembered, the house became too tight over the night and she had to escape... The memory was fuzzy. She's been in the same field for so long, she barely remembers her name. But in the back of her head she'd find it: Ashley.

She stood up, and looked around. Sure enough, she was still in the same field, lined with grass and unchanged for weeks, she actually liked being alone. Another day, a day of waiting. The sun turned into clouds, who soon hovered low above her. She reached up and put her hand in one. It was almost magical.

What was magic about the incident is that Ashley ran away from all civilization before she can turn into a monster. She can no longer remember when she was only a normal 12-year old girl. She became enormous, nearly 600 feet tall. And she was still never noticed. Until this day.

The giant girl placed me on the ground, she towered like a tall building and looked coldly down at me, I felt a bit of fear but stood there, however my courage went downhill when she began to rise her foot, when she did it I started running like a mad man, she rested her arch right behind me, I looked up, her foot was right above me, and it was slowly descending.
I started sprinting even faster, hoping to leave the area in which the foot would land, but it was simply too big, I could see light in the end but her toes blocked it. It was completely dark, it seemed like an apocalypse, but soon I felt excruciating pain and heard a huge "boom" probably from her foot slamming into the ground.

choices: Her foot's pinning his lower half to the floor
142312212.content: Alex expected to die, but luckily, this was not the case. His arm was draped over his face, because of the smelly foot. When he looked up, he could see two fleshy walls on either side of him, her toes! He tries to move, but...
142312212.title: Right between the toes!

choices: find a nice town to start stomping around in so I can get more foot people!
I'll try to get the boy off my toe.
I'll try to squish people with other parts of me! Maybe they'll get suck too!
1423122121.content:
Alex opened his eyes and realized he was still alive. "Ah... That insane child almost killed me!" He thought to himself. He tried to escape from her sweaty foot but he felt his body to be somewhat numb. "Wha..." He thought, before realizing he couldn't speak.

Meanwhile Ashley looked down and didn't see the tiny man anymore. She assumed she had crushed him so hard he was gone! The young titaness decided to skip away.

Alex quickly began to feel moist, almost like he was sweating, but he wasn't moving. It was very hot and still smelled completely like Ashley's feet. He felt a massive glob of sweat drip down his face and realized what happened. When Ashley stomped on the tiny man, she succeeded in crushing him, but for some reason he didn't die... Instead his body was fused to the massive child's toe! Helpless, he stayed as a little and barely distinguishable mark on Ashley's giant toe. He tried to struggle but all he accomplished was causing the toe he was a part of to sweat a little more. He unfortunately still had his senses, taste and smell being the strongest. He could taste every salty drop of sweat that dripped past his surface and had to constantly "breathe" in Ashley's awful foot stench. Her skipping didn't help either, making her sweatier and hotter. Soon the giant girl was leaving small lakes of sweat in her footprints on the earth.

"Oooh... My toe feels nice..." Ashley said as she started to become aware of Alex's position. She looked down at her foot and noticed the little mark that was Alex's body. "Hah! The bad man decided to become part of my toe!"

Alex wanted to curse at her and tell her that he hated this. He wanted to hit her, make her feel the pain he felt right now. But he was helpless. The universe chose this young girl to become this giant creature and him to just be helplessly and probably permanently attached to her sweaty toe.

"Hmm I wonder if I squish more people under my sweaty feet... Maybe they'll get stuck to my feet like this guy!" Ashley says excitedly. She smiled and thought about what to do. "I think I'll...."
1423122121.title: He's now a toe tattoo

15211.content:
The Livingston Circus is a family owned entertainment company that runs the circus, filled with performers through acrobats, animals, stunts, and other entertainers to make people laugh and amazed. Roger Livingston is both the ringmaster, and the man in charger running the business. He had a wife named Sarah, who deals with the animal tricks, his daughter Kelly, who is sixteen, and she’s performing acrobatics, and then his son named Bruce. He’s nine years old, and he’s a bit too young to perform at this moment.

Bruce is more like a helper by any means, which he doesn’t seem to mind of it, since he can basically looking up to his family and other performers, and learn everything from them at this early stage. It was going to be another usual day, which he was there at the tent to set everything up for the next show. That was until he was wanted by his father, Roger, and greeted with that wide smile to his face.

“Hey son! Do you mind if I can talk to you for a bit?” Roger wondered with that smile to his face.

“Sure Dad, what is it?” Bruce wondered with a nod, and listened to what his Dad is asking him.

“You see, I’m glad you wanted to help, since you’re a bit young to perform for our circus, but I’ve just recently had a performer taken ill, and I was wondering if you would like to take its place, and see how you get on?” Roger asked, since he needed someone to fill in its space to get the show going again.

“Really?” Bruce looked surprised with his face been lifted up widely. “You want me to perform in front of the audience?”

“Yes Bruce! I really do! In fact, I’ve got an act just for you to come in as.” Roger says, as he already found some talent his son could do something with it.

“Well that will be great! But what part am I in?” Roger asked with wide smile and was curious as to what his Dad has got for him.

What Roger had something in mind is that he doesn’t have an act that does freak-shows or people with extraordinary things. Of course there was one thing that’s never been done before that is being a giant at 20 feet tall. He knew his nine year old son is a good fit to fill in that role, as he’s only stood at 4’7, so he’ll be hoping if Bruce will enjoy this, as much as he wants to keep this a secret until then.

I’ll surprise you my boy, which is why I wanna...

1522111.content:
You are Bruce, a 9 year old boy, and you stand face to face with a winged creature. The creature appeared human, put had silky pink wings that shimmered as they flapped. The area around you was a floating platform below a starry sky and above planet Earth. You could see the planet rotate above him.

You had a ton of questions, but for some reason he could not open his mouth. Then the winged creature spoke.

"Bruce, I am Plonyce, the guardian and gift-bringer of the planet you call Earth. I check your planet's orbit to make sure it does not drift toward or away from the sun. I also regulate climate on your planet. But the greatest gift I bring is to children like you, Bruce, who have strong desire. Hercules was an example. I will grant to you your strongest desire, to be much taller than the rest of your kind. You will remain like this as long as you remember me and do good to the world."

The dream faded, and you wake up. You are in his bedroom. That was a weird dream, you think as you go downstairs for breakfast. It was Saturday, so you're free to do whatever. As you eat your breakfast, you feel something weird...
1522111.title: The Dream

15221111.content:
Suddenly everything in the kitchen seemed to grow smaller. Before long, your head hit and seemed to want to push through the ceiling. Quickly getting on your hands and knees, you crawl through the back door and into the backyard. It was a tight fit, but you squeezed out of your now-tiny house. Even the backyard soon became small as you step over the fence and into your neighborhood. But even the neighborhood became too small, and you ran towards the park.

You were amazed at what happened over just a few minutes. The trees in the park barely came past your ankles. As Plonyce mentioned in your dream, you were now much taller than the rest of your kind. A huge urge comes to you, begging you to be yourself and have fun.

But you still needed to return the favor to Plonyce. You didn't know how, but you needed to find a way to help others. The people in the neighborhood begin to assemble with guns and knives. You had to run, but where?
15221111.title: Dream Come True!

152211111.content:
You would like to appreciate Plonyce for making you a giant, but you needed to find your find to help these people, especially that the people from a neighbourhood come out in force with guns and knives, and they’ll coming towards you. You knew yourself as a target because of your ginormous size, but you need to get out of here and fast.

“No time to just stand here, I need to get outta here!” Your high pitched voice boomed as you spoke to yourself.

You wouldn’t waste time waiting and hightailing away from the park as quickly as possible. Each step you slammed causes the ground to shake rapidly and loud booms echoing all over. You wouldn’t want to think about this until you had to ran towards the city, which hopefully you’ll be okay in there. You can see the the buildings of the city from your point of view, and it looked magnificent as far as your size advantage is concerned.

“Wow! I never seen this city looking so beautiful quite like it.” You said in amazement whilst you’re still running.

It wouldn’t take long until you’ve arrived there and stopped running to take deep breaths for a moment. You knew that was the longest mileage you had ever ran, though being so big means you have big advantages than all the people in regard. But right now, you’re looking tired and looked around to see what are you doing now.

“Man, at least I’ve made it to the city, but my running pace makes me wanna have some rest. I need to...
152211111.title: Run Towards The City

153221.content:
Tanya drove her 6 year old sister Molly to the beach, annoyed as he got in the car, just like every Saturday. Every time Molly, in her pink swimsuit, gets out of school for the weekend she asks her parents to go to the beach, to which they usually respond, "Ask Tanya to take you this Saturday." Tanya usually says no at first, to which Molly starts punching her until she agrees.

Thinking about this, Tanya lost focus, and she swerves the car off the road. A sudden drop damaged the steering wheel, which later broke due bumpy terrain not suitable for a sedan. Tanya quickly slammed on the brakes, but it didn't do much due to the downhill terrain. She turns on the parking brake, which only made it worse, as the car started tumbling down the road. Before she could get crushed, Tanya quickly opened the driver-side door and exited, leaving Molly behind in the car.

Tanya quickly ran to her sister's help, but to no avail, as the car crashes into a nuclear power plant. She wanted to rescue her, but "No Trespassing" and "Caution: Radioactivity" signs dotted the barb-wire fence that the car cut through. No sign of Molly. Tanya quickly finds the nearest official she could find and tells her the news. "We're already working on it," the official said, "but I think your sister won't be alright."

Hours later workers came out of the power plant with Molly on a gurney, unconscious. Tanya was shocked. "She miraculously survived the crash," Tanya was told. "We treated her for radioactivity, but there may be... side-effects."

Tanya didn't care. She was happy Molly was safe, yet to wake up. Molly looked...
153221.title: Car Crash

choices: Molly grows even more, but everyone except Tanya remembers her being that big!

1532211.content:
Tanya was relieved that her little sister was okay, but something seemed off about Molly. She seemed... Bigger. Tanya zoned out as she looked down at Molly, who was still sleeping. Molly twitched slightly, and Tanya swallowed as she slowly blew up another inch or so, everyone else too engrossed in the conversation to notice.

What happens next?
1532211.title: Molly's A Little Taller

choices: Molly runs away determined NOT TO Be shrunken or stop her growing
15322112.content:
About 20 minutes or so later Tanya notices Molly Twitch again.
To Tanya's shock but confirming what she had seen earlier Molly swelled another 3 inches.


Molly began to stir.

"Mm where am I? What happened big sis and why are you looking at me like that"


"Quick doctor come here something is happening to my sister
Tanya finally gets their attention.


"Ah good she's regained consciousness. What seems to be the problem then"


"Doctor I'm not sure how but she's growing"

The doctor looked at Tanya like she was insane.

"Of course she's growing she is still a child after all"

"No you dolt I mean actually growing as in something straight out of a movie"


"Alright I'll humor you just to prove a point"

With that he helped Molly up and had her get on a combination digital scale and height checker.

The results shocked every nurse and doctor on Molly's case plus her sister.
As the doctor sat the level on her forehead he was went from the chart to the readout.

"Th-there must be some mistake the readings put her at 4 foot 5 and 60 pounds
But her medical records indicate she should be 3 foot 8 and 50 pounds"


"See I told you" huffed Tanya


"Wait are you saying I got taller" said Molly excited.
"Huh I feel strange" added Molly.


The medical staff then watched in shock as Molly grew again.
Her bodies proportions stayed mostly the same as she swelled.
The measurer on her head was pushed up inch by inch.


Molly crept larger over the next minute till her height read 4 foot 10 and her weight reading went up
to 64.6 pounds. Oddly her only clothes growing with her was her pink skirt and her Sky Blue panties.
Her hospital gown was starting to become too small.

"Oh my goodness this is insane! We need to figure out the cause and either stop or reverse it"
said the doctor.
15322112.title: Molly grows a bit more, and wakes up!

choices: Stowaway in a truck or something
Run to the subway and ride as far away as possible
Nearby walking/bike trail to the woods Molly goes!
153221123.content:
Molly listened to the doctors and her sister
discuss her condition.
Molly couldn’t understand it all but there were
bits and pieces that she could.


She knew she was growing and doing so
faster than normal.
That part kinda filled her with some glee.
She wouldn’t have to wait years to be taller.


That was the next thing, Molly knew she
was growing but she felt fine otherwise despite
the medical people’s concerns.


Molly also knew they wanted to stop and
possibly reverse this but Molly liked this.
Molly had wanted to be taller for some time
and this was her chance.


Grown ups got to be tall so why shouldn’t she?
Then Molly’s mind drifts to a couple of movies
and stuff she saw with her sister where someone
grows “super big”


Molly pondered it. It was probably impossible but
what if she got as big as a house?
Office building?
Godzilla?
Was such a thing possible?
Would she want to be that big?


Molly wasn’t sure but she knew one thing.
Selfish, risky as it may be her childish wants
were winning out and right now
Molly didn’t want to stop growing yet.
Molly wasn’t big enough yet!
Most importantly Molly absolutely did not
want this undone.


Again as she made that decision Molly
felt strange.
Molly and the medical staff didn’t quite realize
but Molly’s growth spurts were getting bigger
yet slightly further apart.


It had been 23 minutes 15 seconds since
her last growth but now Molly was
Inching larger and she liked it.


Slowly Molly swells larger, the child sized gown
she was wearing reaching its limits.
Molly swelled just over a foot this time to
5ft 11 her new weight only 66 pounds.


Somehow this growth was slowly starting to
defy even more laws of physics than the
obvious hyper growth.


A ripping noise was heard as Molly’s gown
tore a little in back the strings breaking as
her growth finished for now.


Molly didn’t care.
The now nearly 6 foot 6 year old was more
concerned with the task at hand.


Molly waited until everyone was distracted and
snuck out of the hospital room.
Molly was determined to make a run for it
and let this growth have its way.


Molly made it outta the hospital with a few
close calls and needed to figure out where to
go and hide fast.


Meanwhile the doctors examining Molly’s
blood had called Tanya in to give some
results.


They had made a couple discoveries.
Nothing great but a start.
1st and most concerning was that
Molly’s growth which started slow enough
was becoming exponential.
She was growing roughly 20 to 27% larger
with each spurt meaning that each spurt
would be bigger than the last.


Next they had discovered things the likes
of which they’d never seen.
Despite their best efforts Molly still had
traces of radiation in her greater than
normal for most people but also somehow in
her blood were a mix strange chemicals,
unknown and even strange or theoretical
elements.


Her blood and DNA were like something out
of a sci-fi flick or according to one lab
tech he felt like he was watching that show
“The Flash” play out in real life only
instead of dozens of people it was 1 little
or not so little girl affected.


1 thing for sure is something was going
on at that nuclear plant other than
what would be expected.


Just then Molly and Tanya’s parents arrived
to get the scoop unaware that
Molly had run away.



Molly meanwhile at 5’11 66 pounds was
deciding on where to run and how to let
her growth run its course.

1552121212.content:
Oh, this should be fun, Haruka thought to herself as she approached the beach.

She watched as all of the beach-goers had gone from having fun in the water, to running back onshore and trying to get away. Taking her first step onto the sand itself, she watched as a group of ten tiny people were unlucky enough to get caught under her tread. They popped like little ketchup packets, smearing over the bottom of her foot and the sand.

Haruka did this countless other times, methodically pacing up and down the beach until most of the people and beachfront shops had vanished underneath of her feet. After working up a sweat, the giantess decided a swim would be very relaxing, and she couldn't wait to play with the ships at the pier (which she also noticed was packed with terrified people, the giantess would deal with them in a short while).

Tossing her shirt, sandals, and shorts aside onto a group of people, she giggled to herself as they were smothered under her laundry. Haruka was left wearing nothing but her blue underwear; placing her hands on her hips, she surveyed the water: should she attack the pier, or the ships?
1552121212.title: The beach.

choices: Time to go after those ships!
15521212121.content:
Stomping out into the water, she smiled as it gradually rose up her body, however by the time she reached the end of the pier, it didn't even come up past her knees. Haruka watched as the people on the pier began frantically trying to run back the opposite way in hopes of escape. This simply would not do, and taking a couple steps back, she swiped the dock where it met with the land, crushing countless people against her hand and totally severing any means of escape for those on the dock.

Haruka smiled at the terror on their faces as they all stood frozen in fear, staring up at the enormous giantess. She placed her hands on her hips as she pondered what to do for a moment. Suddenly, a great idea crossed her mind:

I wonder what would happen if I...

Turning around, the giantess slowly began to lower her rear-end down on top of the dock. Many chose to dive into the water in hopes of evading her massive behind, but they would soon find that it would do them no good. As she settled down, she loved the way the people exploded underneath her butt, and she especially savored the way the dock crunched to red-stained splinters beneath her.

After she had settled down, she ground her hips into the water, furthering the last few crunches and silencing the last of the screams. Haruka then lay back in the water, her feet extended out onto the beach, and relaxed.

This is Scott Smith! He’s the 11 year old boy, who stands at 5’4, and weighs at 225lbs. As you can tell already, he’s so obese that he has got a pear-shaped body, making his butt and thighs bigger and wider. Plus, his belly is very noticeably fat also that it hanged over his sweatpants and his shirt riding up, looking awfully tight as a result.

Scott is a binge eater, taking lots of junk food, and having great flavours which makes him want to eat more and more. He wasn’t very keen being so fat as first, since he basically enjoyed the food from a young age. That was until about six months ago, when he had to look at the mirror to check how fat he had gotten.

It may have shocked him at first, but with few jiggles in some areas made him able to chuckle, and decides being so fat is so cool, and that’s he reason why he wanted to eat more junk food as it happens.

But there was one thing he wouldn’t enjoy the most is with people that mistreated him badly. Simply because of how massive he is, and he would get laugh at by everyone, due to being so obese, and they’re all slimmer by any means. Even his older brother is the worst, he would ditched the couch Scott would be sitting and steal some channels for him to watch.
