Life is surely extremely interesting for Debbie Thompson. She is easily one of the most popular girls at her school. She has a great look with her blonde hair and orange eyes, and has a nice and slim body with some decent-sized breasts for a girl her age, but well... that is just one part of her. Another big part of her life is surely... her height.

When she was just a young baby, she has a rare disease that causes her to have some massive growth spurs over her young years. When she was just 3 years old, she was at the roof's height inside her house, and then a few years afterwards, she was as big as a house easily for sure. At age 11 as she is currently, she stands at 50 feet tall, easily towering the suburbs, but still small compared to many buildings around her, but still, it doesn't stop her from growing.

As a result of these growths, scientists and her parents made a tent her size by the park to where she sleeps. Her clothes were all tailored made by various companies for the giant girl, scientists came up with some ways to make food bigger so she can eat and still feel full when she eats, and many other things. But let's just say that living 50 feet high can be tough, but it also does has its perks.

Debbie became really active in Los Angeles on the movie and modeling scene because of her gigantism, and she made huge amounts of money because of it to afford her lifestyle of fame. She is also seen as a hero, stopping crimes all over the city with her giant height, and rescuing people as well as needed. She is also extremely popular among her peers at her school by both the boys and the girls, and Debbie talks to them a lot. To say that Debbie's life is perfect... well... we get into that yourselves.

15531222.content:
Last night had been quite a normal night for young Debbie, she'd played out on the street with her friends after school, done some homework, and rushed to bed at 9pm on the dot.

So why was she waking up in an open, black void? The young girl looked around, eyes widening in confusion as she couldn't pinpoint where the ground was. In fact, there didn't seem to be a ground. Turning around, she was hit with a bright, bright light, one that she quickly recognized as the sun.

But if that was the sun, then where was her home, Earth? As she looked around, she spotted a smaller looking sphere in the distance, and as far as she could see from the light of the star, it was blue and green, it was her old home.

Pushing herself through the void, Debbie closed in on it, wondering why it was so small. She gazed down upon it, the sky being filled with her curious eyes and pearly white smile. Millions upon millions of people gazed up at her as she cast a vast shadow over the surface.

"Hello!" She chirped excitedly, her vast, imperceptible voice washing over humanity, "I'm Debbie!" As she spoke, the bug-like people on the surface began to...

155331212.content:
Miku Sasaki, a 10 year old girl in Japan with dark blue hair and green eyes never really had much of a life so far. She was born in Tokyo, Japan, but sadly she never had much of a true life as she could have hoped, and it was all thanks to a very strange illness. You see, when she was very young, she was infected with a virus that not even the scientist across the world could find a cure. The virus was a horrible one, as it gave her a difficult time breathing, had much seizures, and many other effects. Her parents thought that it would be the end of her, but then the Japanese military came in, and was at the time experimenting with a serum that would make soldiers giant and even give them abilities that only people could ever dreamed about. They said that it could probably cure her, so they gave it a go.

And it did, but at a terrible cost.

First of all, she grew to immense height over the years, so she wouldn't be able to live in the city at all, and had to be set to an island. That was the start of her problems, then she was rendered unable to speak at all, making her quiet permanently, and making her roar and grunt a lot for her voices. It was also undo able, making her parents mad at the general for allowing this. In spite of it though, there was still hope for her, and they still loved her like their daughter, just as she does. Her other abilities lets her shoot lasers from her eyes.

In spite of all of it, and the fact that she would end up being used as a giant monster weapon, Japan and the world all came together and strive to give her the best of a life that she could have. She was so grateful, and she ended up happily accepting it. They would end up making a growth Ray that would let her test out new foods to see if she would like them. They would play music for her so she would be always in a good mood, and at times she would interact with children and her parents. They still make her play like a monster from time to time, making tokusatsu like cities for her to destroy with her abilties and lasers. Btw her appearance is a two-piece dark blue swimsuit, Inspite of dark past, she is still having hope for the future that her voice can be found. She is a mostly quite person, since she cannot talk.

(It still has the elements, new music so, tasting new foods, and quiet. Wanted to make this into the best story I could.)

What happens now?

info.brief_description: Create a child and make him or her grow to extraordinary heights! 2500+ views!
info.description:
UPDATE: Classes have been updated, and some chapters have been rearranged. If a chapter is out of sync with its respective class, shoot me an e-mail.

Create your own child and make him taller and taller! But before your kid becomes massive, I'll need to know three things; his/her description, height as a giant, and his/her alignment (explained below). Here's a sample child below; follow the description format given:

Name: Jacob Jones
Age: 10 (Note: Age must be in between 5 and 12)
Normal Height: 4'6"
Normal Weight: 62 lbs.
Gender: Male
Description: Hyperactive; loves to run. Clumsy with handling objects, and likes cars, trains, or anything that moves fast (relative to him).

When adding a chapter with sample children, please include a "More" choice so that other authors can create theirs. Failure to comply may result in the removal of one of your children you created.

Height: I have divided giants into 5 groups for different heights your child can grow to.

Class A: 7-20 feet tall
Children in this class are better known as Amazons. Perfect for children whose dreams come true by outgrowing their siblings.

Class B: 50-500 feet tall
These kids can outgrow Godzilla. Taller than many buildings, and impervious to most bullets.

Class C: 2000 feet-5 miles tall
A kid this size can challenge many mountains. Unfortunately his/her footsteps cause earthquakes, and he/she can't see other humans well.

Class D: 10-50 miles tall
At this height the child can travel around the world by foot in hours, or even minutes. He/she can also resist nuclear weapons.

Class E: 100+ miles tall
Relatively few match a kid this size in all of existence. Impervious to nearly anything, the giant is free to do whatever he/she likes.

When adding a chapter asking for the child's height, ask what class he/she is in, not a specific height. Specific heights are left to the discretion of the author of the first chapter with storyline. Also, that height is the child's final height, so slow growth spurts are accepted.

Alignment: Be sure to add a chapter asking what alignment the child resides as a giant (Gentle, Evil, Neutral)

Gentle: Normally tries not to do harm, and aids the people in any way he/she can.

Evil: Normally tries to do harm, and his/her goal is to cause as much destruction as possible.

Neutral: Uses his/her size only for personal goals. Can also be temporarily Gentle or Evil.

Last-Minute Rules:

-Write in any POV you like, as long as the focus is on the giant kid
-Other children in between 5 and 12 years of age can be giant, but the main kid must be dominantly taller. (At least twice as tall as everyone else except if he/she is less than 20 feet tall)
-No drug, alcohol, or sexual scenes
-No adult situations
-No gay, bi, or lesbian characters or situations
-No nudity. Everyone must have some form of clothes
-Don't make too many references to one's breasts
-No extreme swearing or vore. This is rated 13+
-No killing any main character. Anyone else is fine as long as it isn't gory
-No furries. Only human children can be massive
-No shrinking. This isn't the place for that
-Only I can end the story
-Don't have the characters be overly OOC. Read the description of the child before making a chapter
-250+ characters to every storyline chapter
-I claim the right to edit or delete any chapter for any reason mentioned above or for poor quality.

So what are you waiting for? From the top of your head, think of a kid you'd like to see huge, and make that possible on paper!
